metadata.title: CVE-2024-2607 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Return registers were overwritten which could have allowed an attacker toexecute arbitrary code. *Note:* This issue only affected Armv7-A systems.Other operating systems are unaffected. This vulnerability affects Firefox< 124, Firefox ESR < 115.9, and Thunderbird < 115.9.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
